quests.title: Hydration Hero
quests.description: Drink 8 glasses of water today to keep your body functioning optimally. Your energy and focus depend on proper hydration.
objectives: Track water intake throughout the day
Notice how hydration affects your energy
tips: Keep a water bottle visible as a reminder
Add lemon or cucumber for variety

quests.title: Fresh Air Wanderer
quests.description: Take a 20-minute walk outside to boost your energy and clear your mind. Nature is the best medicine.
objectives: Step outside for at least 20 minutes
tips: No specific route needed - just move
Fresh air boosts mood and creativity

quests.title: Nutritional Champion
quests.description: Prepare a healthy meal with at least 3 different vegetables. Fuel your body like the hero you are.
objectives: Prepare them in a way you enjoy
tips: Try new spices or cooking methods

quests.title: Sleep Sanctuary Keeper
quests.description: Prepare your bedroom for optimal rest and aim for 7+ hours of quality sleep. Recovery is a hero's secret weapon.
objectives: Set up bedroom for optimal sleep
tips: Cool, dark rooms promote better sleep
Try reading or meditation before bed

quests.title: Flexibility Guardian
quests.description: Do 10 minutes of stretching or yoga to improve flexibility and reduce tension. Your body will thank you.
tips: Even simple stretches make a difference
Great for morning or evening routines

quests.title: Energy Alchemist
quests.description: Take a 10-minute power nap or do energizing breathing exercises to recharge your vitality.
objectives: Either nap for 10-15 minutes or do breathing exercises
tips: Set an alarm for short naps
Even quiet rest helps if you can't nap
